title: RetailMeNot's Di Valerio: App,  In-Store Ads To Grow EPS(Audio)
itunes:title: RetailMeNot's Di Valerio: App,  In-Store Ads To Grow EPS(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: RetailMeNot CFO Scott Di Valerio, on Q2 earnings, current project pipeline, and outlook for back-to-school shopping.
